auth_sentence.content: The attempts to postpone this reconversion are termed evolutionnatural selection.

auth_sentence.content: It is the propensity to natural-selection, to delay reconversion to energy, to maintain the energy in mass format.

auth_sentence.content: Gravity will then initiate reconversion of all the energy back to mass, to singularity, again.
